articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Sunday, the Day of the Sun.
					 Accompanying him were Kim Yong Nam, Presidium member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly; Choe Ryong Hae, Presidium member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK, vice-chairman of the DPRK State Affairs Commission and vice chairman of the C.C., WPK; Pak Pong Ju, Presidium member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK, vice-chairman of the DPRK State Affairs Commission  and premier of the Cabinet; and other senior party and government officials, the chairman of a friendly party, and officials of the C.C., WPK, and power organs, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions.
					
					 Kim Jong Un entered the hall where the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il are standing.
					
					 A floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un was laid at the statues.
					
					 Also placed were a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and a floral basket in the joint name of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, together with visitors, paid high tribute to the statues of the great leaders.
					
					 Then he entered the hall of immortality where Kim Il Sung lies in state. He paid homage to Kim Il Sung in the humblest reverence for him.
					
					 He entered the hall of immortality where Kim Jong Il lies in state. He paid homage to Kim Jong Il in the humblest reverence for him.

articles.title: Ballet Choreodrama "Red Women Company" Given by Chinese Art Troupe
articles.content:
Ballet Choreodrama "Red Women Company" Given by Chinese Art Troupe
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The Chinese art troupe for the 31st April Spring Friendship Art Festival gave a ballet choreodrama "Red Women Company" at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Sunday.
					 Kim Yong Nam, Presidium member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Pak Kwang Ho and Ri Su Yong, members of the Political Bureau and vice-chairmen of the C.C., WPK, and other senior officials of the party and government arrived at the theatre and exchanged greetings with Song Tao, head of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., Communist Party of China, and Li Jinjun, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK. Then they enjoyed the performance together with artistes and Pyongyangites.
					
					 Among the audience were foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies here and their wives, military attaches and their wives and foreigners here.
					
					 Through the ballet choreodrama "Red Women Company", a model of the ballets with the Chinese characteristics, the artistes of the prestigious National Ballet of China wonderfully depicted the course in which the Chinese women, who suffered from exploitation and humiliation, grow to be revolutionary fighters under the guidance of the Communist Party of China in the 1930s with the graceful and beautiful dances.

articles.title: Chinese Art Troupe Visits Friendship Tower
articles.content:
Chinese Art Troupe Visits Friendship Tower
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The Chinese art troupe for the 31st April Spring Friendship Art Festival led by Song Tao, head of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, Monday visited the Friendship Tower.
					 The guests were accompanied by Ri Chang Gun, vice department director of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, Li Jinjun, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Floral baskets in the names of Song Tao and Li Jinjun were placed at the tower.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the fallen soldiers of the Chinese People's Volunteers, who bravely fought in the Korean front against the imperialist invasion under the unfurled banner of resisting America and aiding Korea, safeguarding the home and defending the motherland.
					
					 Then they went round the tower.
					
					 Song Tao made an entry in the visitor's book that "China- DPRK friendship will be everlasting."

articles.title: Cambodian King, Great Queen Send Large Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Cambodian King, Great Queen Send Large Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Cambodian King Norodom Sihamoni and Great Queen Norodom Monineath Sihanouk sent large floral baskets to the DPRK embassy in Phnom Penh on April 12 with the approach of the 106th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Upon the authorization by the king and the great queen, a delegation of the Cambodian Ministry of Royal Palace led by Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister for Royal Palace, laid the floral baskets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Kong Sam Ol said that he regards it as an honor the delegation paid a congratulatory visit to the DPRK embassy on the occasion of the 106th birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, and went on:
					
					 The king and the great queen authorized me to pay high tribute to HE the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung most ardently revered by the Cambodian people on the occasion of the auspicious Day of the Sun.
					
					 They also authorized me to convey their warm wishes to HE Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, and all the Korean people.
					
					 I wholeheartedly wish HE Kim Jong Un, the Supreme Leader of the Korean people, good health and happiness and hope that he would lead the country and people to a brilliant victory and prosperity.

articles.title: Reception Given to Mark Day of Sun
articles.content:
Reception Given to Mark Day of Sun
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- A reception was given at the People's Palace of Culture on Sunday, the 106th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the WPK Central Committee, Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and vice-chairman of the SAC, and other party and government officials, the chairman of a friendly party, officials of armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, merited persons, members of overseas compatriots' congratulatory groups and delegations including the group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the Day of the Sun, and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Foreign diplomatic envoys, representatives of international bodies and military attaches and their spouses and other foreign guests here were invited to the reception.
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae in his speech said President Kim Il Sung remains the eternal benefactor of the nation, the father of socialist Korea and a great sage of the revolution as he illuminated the road ahead of the country, the revolution and mankind with bright rays of the Juche idea and performed undying exploits for carving out of the destiny of the Korean people and global independence.
					
					 The speaker extended high respects and glory to the President in reflection of the feelings of all service personnel and people of the DPRK and the world progressive people.
					
					 He called for holding in high esteem President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for all ages, dynamically advancing toward the victory of socialism under the guidance of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and thus realizing the patriotic desire of the great leaders for building a powerful country.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Observed by OSPAALA
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Observed by OSPAALA
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America (OSPAALA) laid a floral basket before a portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung with due ceremony on April 13 ahead of his birth anniversary.
					 Attending the ceremony were the secretary general and members of the OSPAAAL and the DPRK ambassador to Cuba and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 The participants laid the floral basket before the portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung and paid tribute to him.

articles.title: Tablet Bearing August Name of Kim Il Sung Unveiled in Cuba
articles.content:
Tablet Bearing August Name of Kim Il Sung Unveiled in Cuba
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- A tablet bearing the august name of President Kim Il Sung was unveiled at Kim Il Sung High School in Cuba on April 10 with the approach of his birth anniversary.
					 A floral basket was laid before the tablet reading "
					
					 Kim Il Sung High School". Then followed speeches.
					
					 The head of the school said:
					
					 I am glad to unveil the tablet bearing the august name of the great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung at our school on the occasion of his 106th birth anniversary.
					
					 The head noted that the teaching staff and students of the school are deeply studying the immortal revolutionary activities of Kim Il Sung, the genuine comrade and comrade-in-arms of Cuban revolution.
					
					 He said that we will devote ourselves to preparing students to be reliable reserves of socialism and the Cuban revolution by making them follow the brilliant model of Kim Il Sung. We will also educate the students so as to make a positive contribution to the friendship and unity between the two countries, he added.
					
					 Present at the unveiling ceremony were personages of the school, Ministry of Higher Education, Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification and the Cuban Institute of Friendship with the Peoples, masses, the DPRK ambassador to Cuba and staff members of his embassy.

articles.title: Bulletin "Day of Sun" Issued by Bulgarian Organization
articles.content:
Bulletin "Day of Sun" Issued by Bulgarian Organization
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association issued a bulletin on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The bulletin in an article titled "The Day of the Sun" said that Kim Il Sung, who was born at a revolutionary and patriotic family, embarked upon the road of revolution in his teens and defeated the gangster-like Japanese imperialists, liberated the country and turned the DPRK into a socialist country, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan con motivo del Dia del Sol
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan con motivo del Dia del Sol
Pyongyang, 16 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Dia del Sol, el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un visito el dia 15 el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan. 
					Le acompanaron en la ceremonia de homenaje Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y del CC del PTC, Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado y primer ministro de la RPDC, y otros cuadros del Partido y el gobierno, el presidente de partido amigo, y los funcionarios del CC del PTC, los organismos del Poder, el Consejo de Ministros, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales. 
					
					El Maximo Dirigente entro en el hall donde estan erguidas las estatuas de pie del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Fue depositado alli un cesto de flores a nombre de Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Quedaron colocados tambien un cesto de flores a nombre comun del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del PTC y el Comite de Estado de la RPDC y otro en nombre comun del Presidium de la APS y el Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC. 
					
					El Maximo Dirigente rindio junto con los participantes el homenaje postumo a los grandes Lideres antecesores. 
					
					Volvio a hacerles reverencia en los salones de eternidad donde estan conservados sus cuerpos.

articles.title: Cuadros del Partido y el gobierno presencian drama de ballet "Roja compania femenina"
articles.content:
Cuadros del Partido y el gobierno presencian drama de ballet "Roja compania femenina"
Pyongyang, 16 de abril (ACNC) -- El grupo artistico de China que participo en el XXXI Festival Artistico de Amistad Abril en Primavera, ofrecio el dia 15 en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang Este la funcion del drama de ballet "Roja compania femenina".
					Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Kwang Ho y Ri Su Yong, miembros del Buro Politico y vicepresidentes del CC del PTC y otros cuadros del Partido y el gobierno llegaron al teatro donde intercambiaron el saludo con Song Tao, jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y el embajador chino Li Jinjun en Corea y vieron la funcion junto con los artistas y capitalinos.
					
					Tambien, lo presenciaron los matrimonios de los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales, los de agregados militares, en Corea, y los huespedes extranjeros que se encuentran en Corea.
					
					En la funcion del drama del ballet "Roja compania femenina", modelo de ballet de particularidad china, los artistas del Conjunto Central de Ballet de China demostraron bien con sus hermosas habilidades coreograficas el proceso de que las mujeres chinas, que fueron objetos de la explotacion y el maltrato en la decada de 1930, se crecian como las combatientes revolucionarias bajo la direccion del Partido Comunista de China.

articles.title: Grupo artistico chino visita Monumento a la Amistad
articles.content:
Grupo artistico chino visita Monumento a la Amistad
Pyongyang, 16 de abril (ACNC) -- El grupo artistico de China encabezado por Song Tao, jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China, que toma parte en el XXXI Festival Artistico de Amistad Abril en Primavera, visito el dia 16 el Monumento a la Amistad.
					Acompanaron el subjefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Ri Chang Gun, el embajador Li Jinjun y otros integrantes de la embajada china en Corea.
					
					Fueron depositados al monumento los cestos de flores a nombres de Song Tao y Li Jinjun.
					
					Los visitantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria de los martires del Cuerpo de Voluntarios del Pueblo Chino que bajo la bandera de "resistir a los yanquis, ayudar a Corea, y defender el hogar y el pais propios" lucharon con valentia en el frente coreano contra la agresion armada de los imperialistas.
					
					Acto seguido, pasaron revista al monumento.
					
					Song Tao escribio "Sera eterna la amistad China-Corea" en el libro de visitas.

articles.title: Rey y gran reina de Camboya envian cestos de flores a embajada coreana
articles.content:
Rey y gran reina de Camboya envian cestos de flores a embajada coreana
Pyongyang, 16 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del aniversario 106 del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el rey Norodom Sihamoni y la gran reina Norodom Monineath Sihanouk, de Camboya, enviaron el dia 12 los cestos de flores de gran tamano a la embajada coreana acreditada en su pais.
					Por encargo de los remitentes, la delegacion del Ministerio del Palacio Real del gobierno del Reino de Camboya, encabezada por Kong Sam Ol, vicepremier encargado del Palacio Real, rindio homenaje a los grandes Lideres coreanos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il tras depositar los cestos de flores ante sus retratos con amplia sonrisa.
					
					El vicepremier dijo que considera como gloria realizar la visita de felicitacion a la embajada coreana en ocasion del aniversario 106 de Su Excelencia Generalisimo Kim Il Sung.
					
					Prosiguio que en ocasion del Dia del Sol, el rey y la gran reina le encargaron rendir homenaje al Su Excelencia Generalisimo Kim Il Sung a quien venera mas el pueblo camboyano y transmitirle el saludo de felicitacion a Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, y a todo el pueblo coreano.
					
					Deseo buna salud y felicidad al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un y que este condujera el pais y el pueblo a la victoria y prosperidad.
